#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
   while(t--)
    {
       long int ht,ht1,mt1,st1,ht2,mt2,st2;
       cin>>ht1>>mt1>>st1;
       cin>>ht2>>mt2>>st2;
       long int h1=((ht1*3600)+(mt1*60)+(st1));
       long int h2=((ht2*3600)+(mt2*60)+(st2));
       ht=(h2-h1)%400;
       
       if((ht>=0 && ht<=99) || (ht>=200 && ht<=299))
         cout<<"S"<<endl;
       else
         cout<<"C"<<endl;
     }
   return 0;
}
